issue.title: Monitor : remove own version of JQuery, update Highcharts and move to FE
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Monitor loads it's own version of JQuery which conflict with Joomla's version.
I propose to remove the lib and use systems' default.

Thomas, do you agree ?

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

Yes I tried it but HighChart doesn't show anymore the charts if we don't load this jquery version. But I didn't search why. It must be a detail but I didn't have time to look further.

**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Proposed fix : 
* update to last version of Highcharts in the 2.x series witch should be compliant with the joomla's JQuery version
* place hightchart in FE like other libs
* remove embedded JQuery

**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Also :
* remove unused XMLRPC2 lib
* move assets to FE (CSS + img)
* fix plugin

**Original author :** Blatti Yves

+ fix wrong case in default parameters (Monitor -> monitor)

**Original author :** Blatti Yves

build.xml use wrong pathname for monitor plugin, fix and commit in rev. 9889
